# List All Project Features and Functionalities

Search through the entire project and list all the features and functionalities implemented. 

## Core Features
- Main functionality
- Primary use cases
- Core business logic

## User-Facing Features
- UI components and pages
- User interactions
- Forms and data input
- Search and filtering
- Sorting and pagination

## API & Endpoints
- REST API endpoints
- GraphQL queries/mutations
- WebSocket connections
- API documentation

## Authentication & Authorization
- User registration and login
- Password management
- Session management
- Role-based access control (RBAC)
- Permissions system
- OAuth/SSO integrations

## Data Management
- CRUD operations
- Data validation
- Data processing and transformation
- Import/export features
- File upload and management

## Background Processing
- Scheduled tasks and cron jobs
- Background workers
- Queue systems
- Batch processing

## External Integrations
- Third-party APIs
- Payment gateways
- Email services
- Cloud storage
- Analytics tools
- Social media integrations

## Admin & Management
- Admin dashboard
- User management
- Content management

- Reports and analytics

## Notifications & Communication
- Email notifications

- In-app notifications
- SMS or messaging

## Performance & Optimization
- Caching strategies
- Rate limiting
- Pagination
- Lazy loading

## Other Notable Features
- Internationalization (i18n)
- Accessibility features
- Error handling and logging
- Backup and recovery
- Any other capabilities

**Note:** Please organize features by category or module when possible, and provide a brief description of what each feature does.
